person.persName: William A. Ladd (Caldwell County, KY, pvt. 52nd Ky inf)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Jason Ladd and Mary A. Ladd. Resident of Christian County, Kentucky, in 1850. Served in the 52nd Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from November 20, 1863, to January 17, 1865.
